certifications.title: Psychology Of Stress Health And Well Being

projects.name: E-Learning Platform
projects.description: Designed a user-friendly website enabling users to select courses of their interest. The website helps in assisting users in learning online with the help of tutors. Ensured the website can handle a large number of users simultaneously.

projects.name: Tackling Disinformation: Machine Learning Solutions for Fake News Detection
projects.description: Classified the given news as fake or real after considering various factors. Committed to mastering various machine learning algorithms, including the Naive Bayes Classifier and Support Vector Machines (SVM), among others. Evaluated two datasets to obtain better results, achieving an accuracy of 99.69% with SVM and 99.06% with Logistic Regression.

experiences.description: Collaborated with a professor to explore various research areas. Gained in-depth experience in the chosen research problem.

full_output.name: Jyothish Nagaram
achievements_and_awards: Secured a rank of 8532 out of 1.5 lakh participants in the AP EAPCET exam and was admitted to the Bachelors degree program at SRM University AP with a full scholarship.
Data Base Management System NPTEL Topper (Top 5%)
Psychology Of Stress Health And Well Being (Top 5%)
publications: Abdur Rashid Sangi, Jyothish Nagaram, Akshara Sudulagunta, Sai Sandeep Talari, Vinay Malla, Murali Krishna Enduri, and Satish Anamalamudi. 2023. Tackling Disinformation: Machine Learning Solutions for Fake News Detection. In 2023 13th International Conference on Communication and Network Security (ICCNS) (ICCNS 2023), December 0103, 2023, Fuzhou, China.
